name: Chrono Rush
description:
Chrono Rush is a Top-Down Bullet Hell Rouge-Like where you jump back in time to rewrite your history.

Play with time, bullets, dashes, and pain in this hard-as-nails bullet hell.

WSDA to move.

Z to pick up items/open doors.

Left-click to fire, aim with the mouse.

Right-click to use Character Abillity.
